definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: mother of Jehoiakim 2Ki 23:36 [[זְביּדָּ֠ה בַת־פְּדָיׇה מִן־רוּמָה]]; (‖ 2Ch 36:5 om. MT); quite otherwise LXXB )Iella, daughter of )Edeil; in A the names are Ei)eldaf & Ei)eddila; LXX 2Ch 36:5 Ze(k)xwra & Nhreiou; LXXL (K & Ch) )Amital & )Ieremiou (confusion with Zedekiah's mother 2Ch 24:18).
